options.name: acceleration
options.hint: Acceleration Factor used up to the Maximum value

options.name: startValue
options.hint: Start value and direction. 0 for Auto, >0 for Long, <0 for Short

options.hint: Percent offset added/removed to initial stop on short/long reversal

options.hint: Acceleration Factor initial value for the Long direction
